Author: colazerocultleader
Text: I'm sorry your bf isn't the support you need :( anyway from this amount of cals you ain't gonna gain anything significant. like literally I don't think there will be any gain, just water weight for a few days. tomorrow just enjoy your precious time with friends and please try not to restrict, just go back to normal. 2200 is not that much. you are okay. you will not gain. don't be afraid.

Author: nnlssthrpl
Text: first of all your bf kinda terrible if he won’t support you. but second of all it’s ok remember that one or two days is not going to damage your progress or stay on your body. kinda gross but i imagine myself just expelling all the calories (v nice way of saying it) i really hope you can recover but i’m getting told that all the time is annoying so imma say in those situations i say i’ve had a big breakfast and eat half of everything. that way no ones too suspicious i got to enjoy some nice food with friends but usually it doesn’t trigger my intrusive thoughts about it. anyway tho i wish you the best of luck and i hope you manage to enjoy nye it’s a fun day! <3
